title: Brazilian influencer Maria Luiza Costa da Silva dies at 18 after knife attack outside Recife bar by her boyfriend’s ex girlfriend
summary_full: ​​Maria Luiza Costa da Silva, an 18-year-old Brazilian influencer, was stabbed to death in Recife on January 31 after an argument involving her boyfriend and his ex-girlfriend. Police say the suspect fled but was later arrested at a hospital. The case is being investigated as a homicide, according to G1 and Metrópoles.
